title: Gazebo windows CI qt5 dep needs to be pre-installed

content.raw: We are hosting a [zip file of qt5](http://packages.osrfoundation.org/win32/deps/qt5-x64-static-release.zip qt5-x64-static-release.zip) for use in gazebo CI on windows, and it was added to the install scripts in pull request #415 (in gazebo-base-windows.bat at [line 28](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/415/fix-gazebo-windows-build/diff#Ljenkins-scripts/lib/gazebo-base-windows.batT28)), but it is a static build and caused linking errors. So the use of that qt5 build was [reverted in favor of a pre-installed version](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/commits/b79c94879deb505918d2f1e71b011a1171ce1e56?at=gazebo8) in order to fix the build. We should fix the downloadable dependency at some point.
content.html: We are hosting a zip file of qt5 for use in gazebo CI on windows, and it was added to the install scripts in pull request #415 (in gazebo-base-windows.bat at line 28), but it is a static build and caused linking errors. So the use of that qt5 build was reverted in favor of a pre-installed version in order to fix the build. We should fix the downloadable dependency at some point.
